page.title: 12FOXTON AT WORK
page.content: There is very little work in the village itself.We have a shop run by Mr.and Mrs. Thornton which supplies everything from pins to pineapples. We have 2 Public houses,the Black Horse(Mr.and Mrs. collins),the Shoulder of Mutton(Roy Plius)actually in the village + the Pub/Restaurant at Foxton Locks.Gartree has its own Officer's club The Jolly Warder. By and large though most people work outside the area.The following are some of the jobs our parents do Housewives,Cobbler,Prison Officer,Auctioneer,Sculptor,Teachers, Shop assistants,Tailoress,Farmers. Foxton is therefore a dormitory town and not an idustrial one.
